description: Electricity generation from bioenergy - Measured in terawatt-hours.
Carbon intensity of electricity generation - Greenhouse gases emitted per unit of generated electricity, measured in grams of CO₂ equivalents per kilowatt-hour.
unit: grams of CO₂ equivalents per kilowatt-hour
source: Ember - Yearly Electricity Data (2024) [https://ember-climate.org/data-catalogue/yearly-electricity-data/]; Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024) [https://www.energyinst.org/statistical-review/]
